content: अयव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Deficient. {@--2@} Having worthless or no barley, such as a religious ceremony (also अयवक in this sense). --वः {@--1@} Name of a worm bred in excrement. {@--2@} (अयवन् {%<ab>m.</ab>%}, अयवस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} also). The dark half of the month; पूर्वपक्षा वै यवा अपरपक्षा वा अयवास्तेहीदे सर्वं युवते चायुवते च <ls>Śat. Br.</ls> {@--3@} An incongruous enemy.
